name: Dust Of Centuries (released)
description:
Hello. This is my first released game and I'm happy to present it!

Dust Of Centuries is a short experimental shooter-rpg game inspired by the wonderful jrpg genre. This game is actually my personal playground where I've experimented with all kinds of stuff. I tried realistic graphics, 2D graphics, different genres and different points of view. End up with this version because it was the most fun to work with. Not every feature was released but experimenting was fun as hell. I hope you'll enjoy. :)

(If you die, you will have to start the game from the beginning :3)

Developed by Enixoid

Music by Nosoapradio.us
